nodes.text: The Geonosian Arenas were Monuments constructed by the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Clone Wars. They were constructed by Geonosian Workers at a cost of 3000 units each of carbon, ore and nova crystals. The Arenas resembled the Petranaki arena on Geonosis, which had been the literal starting point of the Clone Wars.

Geonosian Arenas appear in the 2002 video game expansion pack Star Wars: Galactic Battlegrounds: Clone Campaigns. In multiplayer, players can build monuments such as this one, and if defended for 200 in-game "days," can win the scenario.
